articles.description: Less than three weeks after Uttarakhand became the first state in independent India to pass legislation on a Uniform Civil Code, Assam has taken its first step towards a similar law by repealing the Muslim Marriage and Divorce Act.
articles.content:
Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma had earlier said that the country needs a uniform policy.
